Everything is a brand

April 25th 2020

EVERYTHING IS A BRAND

Theme parks Water El Casei Immunitas Whiskeys Wine Football clubs

It’s marketing when it’s a story we’re told, it’s a brand when it’s a story we tell ourselves.

There are two areas where brands seem to perform best, one is to establish a market dominant position (e.g. Coca Cola, accept no substitute) , and the other is when there’s unlimited high end. Cigars, Whiskey, Brandy, are all obvious
